articles.title: General Secretary of C.C., CPV to Pay Official Goodwill Visit to DPRK
articles.content:
General Secretary of C.C., CPV to Pay Official Goodwill Visit to DPRK 
   Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- At the invitation of Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Nong Duc Manh, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, will pay an official goodwill visit to the DPRK in the near future.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Mongolian Government Economic Delegation
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Mongolian Government Economic Delegation
Choe Thae Bok Meets New Indian Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets New Indian Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Zile Singh, new Indian ambassador to the DPRK who paid a  courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Delegations of Yonhap News and Kyodo News Arrive
articles.content:
Delegations of Yonhap News and Kyodo News Arrive 
   Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Yonhap News of south Korea led by Director General Kim Ki So and a delegation of the Kyodo News of Japan led by President Satoshi Ishikawa arrived here on Tuesday to participate in the photo exhibition of the Koguryo mural paintings.

Nong Duc Manh visitara la RPDC
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de la delegacion de Mongolia
articles.content:
Nong Duc Manh visitara la RPDC
   Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ATCC) -- El secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam, Nong Duc Manh, realizara en un tiempo cercano una visita oficial y de amistad a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cumplimentando la invitacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC.
